targets.expr: avg by (VolumeID) (powermax_volume_used_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$ArrayID", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", Namespace=~"$Namespace"})

avg by (VolumeID) (powermax_volume_total_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$ArrayID", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", Namespace=~"$Namespace"})

powermax_volume_read_bw_megabytes_per_second{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"} and topk($TopX, avg_over_time(powermax_volume_read_bw_megabytes_per_second{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[$TimeFrame]))

powermax_volume_write_bw_megabytes_per_second{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"} and topk($TopX, avg_over_time(powermax_volume_write_bw_megabytes_per_second{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[$TimeFrame]))

powermax_volume_read_latency_milliseconds{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"} and topk($TopX, avg_over_time(powermax_volume_read_latency_milliseconds{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[$TimeFrame]))

powermax_volume_write_latency_milliseconds{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"} and topk($TopX, avg_over_time(powermax_volume_write_latency_milliseconds{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[$TimeFrame]))

powermax_volume_read_io_per_second{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"} and topk($TopX, avg_over_time(powermax_volume_read_io_per_second{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[$TimeFrame]))

powermax_volume_write_io_per_second{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"} and topk($TopX, avg_over_time(powermax_volume_write_io_per_second{PlotWithMean=~"($ShowMean)", VolumeID=~"$VolumeID", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName",Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[$TimeFrame]))

list.definition: query_result((  powermax_volume_read_bw_megabytes_per_second{Namespace="$Namespace"}    * on(PersistentVolumeClaimName) group_left(pod)  label_replace(    kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$Namespace", pod="$VMPod"},    "PersistentVolumeClaimName", "$1", "persistentvolumeclaim", "(.*)"  ))* on(pod) group_left(name) label_replace(  kubevirt_vmi_info{namespace="$Namespace", vmi_pod="$VMPod"}, "pod", "$1", "vmi_pod", "(.*)"))
list.label: PVCName
list.name: PVCName

query.query: query_result((  powermax_volume_read_bw_megabytes_per_second{Namespace="$Namespace"}    * on(PersistentVolumeClaimName) group_left(pod)  label_replace(    kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$Namespace", pod="$VMPod"},    "PersistentVolumeClaimName", "$1", "persistentvolumeclaim", "(.*)"  ))* on(pod) group_left(name) label_replace(  kubevirt_vmi_info{namespace="$Namespace", vmi_pod="$VMPod"}, "pod", "$1", "vmi_pod", "(.*)"))

list.label: PV Name
list.name: PVName
